altTitle: 母親がエロラノベ大賞受賞して人生詰んだ　せめて息子のラブコメにまざらないでください
Hahaoya ga Ero Light Novel Taishou Jushou Shite Jinsei Tsunda: Semete Musuko no Love Comedy ni Mazaranai de Kudasai
Life Is A Mess Since My Mom Won An Ero-Novel Grand Prize~ At Least Don't Mess With Your Son's Romantic Comedy!
title: Hahaoya ga Ero Ranobe Taishou Jushou Shite Jinsei Tsunda: Semete Musuko no Love Come ni Mazaranai de Kudasai
